label: 小袿
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A gown of fancy stuff of the same shape as a gown (uchiki) but somewhat shorter, worn by a woman at home when some formality was desired; also kazami—a long garment worn on top, especially by page girls in formal dress.[袿、衵・袙][RK]
